UPDATE TMPRD.CT1010
   SET CT1_BLOQ = '1',
       D_E_L_E_T_ = ' ',
       R_E_C_D_E_L_ = 0
WHERE 
R_E_C_N_O_ IN 
(3641,2507,8065,8004,8042,3724,2442,1973,3642,3697,2590,2404,2488,3788,2651,2654,2934,2936,
 3082,3088,3127,3135,3028,3124,3931,3981,4050,4078,4240,4379,4464,4530,4603,5421)
AND CT1_CONTA IN
('210501000563',
'210501000573',
'210501000631',
'210501000831',
'210501000859',
'210501000940',
'210501000961',
'210501001022',

'210105900114');
